definition: 10th earthly branch: 5-7 p.m., 8th solar month (8th September-7th October), year of the Rooster/ancient Chinese compass point: 270° (west)
fourth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/fourth in order/letter "D" or Roman "IV" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 195°/butyl/cubes (of food)
dead drunk/as drunk as a lord

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the effects of Qufeng Zhiyang tincture on anti-allergic and anti-pruritus.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究祛風止癢酊的抗過敏與止癢作用。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a method for controlling aurantiamarin content of orange peel tincture in Mistura Pepsini.
sentences.chinese: 目的對胃蛋白酶合劑中橙皮酊進行含量控制。

sentences.english: Benzalkonium Bromide Tincture had better disinfection effect, but had irritation to skin.
sentences.chinese: 百多邦對皮膚刺激性小但消毒效果低於新潔爾滅酊。

sentences.english: Conclusion Shangtongding liniment is effective in treating acute closed soft tissue injury.
sentences.chinese: 結論傷痛酊擦劑治療急性閉合性軟組織損傷療效確切。

definition: to take medicine orally (as opposed to applying externally)
liquorice (Sophora flavescens), with roots used in TCM
to apply (ointment, powder)/to smear/to paint on
red root gromwell (Lithospermum erythrorhizon)/flowering plant whose roots provide purple dye/arnebia (plant genus in family Boraginaceae)
